name: Dwarfs Fight
description:
What is Dwarfs Fight ?

DwarfsFight is a turn-based strategy game and fast decision making.

You fight against another team of Dwarves, to beat it you have 3 types of unit for 7 summonable units in total. Will you be able to use it well?

Show that you are the finest strategist !

How to play ?

To win: Attack the opposing flag or eliminate the 7 opposing units.

You have one action and 15 seconds per turn. Your turn ends after this action.

Your units have only one life point, so each attack is fatal.

Features on version 0 .7.9 :
  • Online 1v1
  • Earn golds
  • LeaderBoard
  • 3 differents playable maps
Reach the top of the ranking !

The first three units ! Warrior
Archer Defender
